LanguageData.DMS_FireControlGuidance.label: fire-control guidance
LanguageData.DMS_FireControlGuidance.description: Actively locks hostile targets with radar and shares fire-control data with nearby friendly automatroids.
LanguageData.DMS_MechEnergyStabilizer.label: wireless power transfer
LanguageData.DMS_MechEnergyStabilizer.description: Activates a wireless power system that steadily replenishes the energy of nearby friendly mechanoids.
LanguageData.DMS_EmergencyPowerTransfer.label: emergency power transfer
LanguageData.DMS_EmergencyPowerTransfer.description: Performs an emergency energy transfer to a colony mechanoid, fully recharging its battery.
LanguageData.DMS_BattlefieldRepair.label: battlefield repair
LanguageData.DMS_BattlefieldRepair.description: Touch a mechanoid corpse and conduct field repairs, reviving a fallen friendly mechanoid.
LanguageData.DMS_IFFConfusionPulse.label: IFF disruption pulse
LanguageData.DMS_IFFConfusionPulse.description: Emits an intense jamming pulse that scrambles hostile mechanoids' identification systems. They fail to lock onto your units and will intermittently misidentify their own allies as targets.
